title: Weird Tales v06 n02 [1925-08]
description: CONTENTS: Weird Tales [v6 #2, August 1925] (25¢, 144pp+, pulp, cover by Andrew Brosnatch) 149 · Black Medicine · Arthur J. Burks · nv 167 · The Oldest Story In The World · Murray Leinster · ss 177 · The Bearded Men · Adam Hull Shirk · ss 185 · In The Forest Of Villefère [de Montour] · Robert E. Howard · ss 187 · Stallions Of The Moon · Frank Belknap Long, Jr. · pm 188 · The Man Who Laughed · B. W. Sliney · ss 193 · The Purple Cincture · H. Thompson Rich · ss 200 · The White Queen Of The Corolans [Part 2 of 2] · Arthur Thatcher · nv 210 · The Jonah · Guy Pain · ss 213 · The Green Scarab · Willis Knapp Jones · ss 219 · The Lantern-Maker · Frank Owen · ss 223 · Servants Of Satan #6. Maria Schweidler · Seabury Quinn · ar 231 · The Devil’s Opera · Arthur S. Garbett · ss 240 · Dr. Heidegger’s Experiment · Nathaniel Hawthorne · ss The Knickerbocker January 1837, as “The Fountain Of Youth” 247 · The Graveyard Skunk · Harry Harrison Kroll · ss 254 · The Last Trip · Archie Binns · ss 258 · La Belle Dame Sans Merci · John Keats · pm The Poetical Works Of John Keats , Edward Moxon 1848; written in 1819. A somewhat different version was published in The Indicator , May 10, 1820. 259 · The Vulture Of Pignon · W. J.
